Question 1

1a
```{r}
square <- function(x=NULL, a=NULL,b=NULL){

}

```

Question 3
```{r}
queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")
print(queue)
queue <-c(queue[2:4], "serpent")
print(queue)

queue <- c("donkey", queue[1:4])
print(queue)

queue <- queue[1:4]
print(queue)

queue <- append(queue[1:4], "aphid", after=3)
print(queue)

index <- which(queue == "aphid")
print(index)
```
